rules_text:
When Edible Effigy enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{3}{G}: Put three +1/+1 counters on another target noncreature permanent you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.
